offer_summary.company_name: VML Enterprise Solutions Sp. z o.o.
offer_summary.job_description: A Python Developer position is available at VML Enterprise Solutions Sp. z o.o. in Poznań, Poland. The role involves designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications for clients using Python and related frameworks.
requirements: Hands-on experience with RDBMS (Postgres, Oracle or others) and ORM
Strong knowledge of Python 3.x and either FastAPI/Flask framework
Significant experience of working with Agile methodologies
requiered_skills: Python development experience with a focus on web applications/services
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices and industry standards
nice_to_have_skills: GCP or any other Cloud experience
benefits: Fully remote job as well as possibility to visit our offices in Poznań, Katowice and Bydgoszcz
Work equipment with delivery to your door
Technical knowledge exchange within the company
